title: Arima Arima Lyrics Endhiran song lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Hariharan, Sadhana Sargam , Benny Dayal, Naresh Iyer
Lyrics: Vairamuthu

Ivan perai sonnadhum perumai sonnadhum
kadalum kadalum kai thattum
Ivan ulagam thaandiya uyaram kondathil
nilavu nilavu thalai muttum
Adi azhage ulagazhage indha enthiran enbavan padaippin uchcham

Arima arima naano aayiram arima un pol
pon maan kidaithal yamma summa vidumaa

Rajaathi...ulogathil
Aasai thee ... mooluthadi
Naan atlantic-ai ootri parthen akkini anayilaye
Un pachai thenai ootru en ichchai theeyai aattru
Adi kachai kaniye pandhi nadathu kattil ilai pottu

Arima arima naano ...
Ivan perai sonnadhum perumai sonnadhum ..

Sittrinba narambu semitha irumbil
sattendru mogam pongittrey

Ratchashan vendaam rasigan vendum
pennullam unnai kenjithtrey
pennullam unnai kenjithtrey

Naan manithan alla ahrinayin arasan naan
kaamutra kanini naan
chinnan sirusin idhayam thinnum
silicone singam naan

Arima arima naano ...
Ivan perai sonnadhum perumai sonnadhum ..

Megathai uduthum minnal thaan naanendru
aisu-kkue ice-u vaikkadhey

Vayarellam osai uyirellam aasai
robo-vai po po-vennadhey

Ae yezham arive un moolai thirudugiraai
uyirodu unnugiraai â€“ nee
undu mudutha micham yedhuvo
adhu thaan nanendraai

Ivan perai sonnadhum perumai sonnadhum
kadalum kadalum kai thattum
Ivan ulagam thaandiya uyaram kondathil
nilavu nilavu thalai muttum
Adi azhage ulagazhage indha enthiran enbavan padaippin uchcham
Arima arima naano aayiram arima un pol
pon maan kidaithal yamma summa vidumaa

seo.title: Arima Arima Lyrics Endhiran song lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Arima Arima Lyrics Endhiran song lyrics from Endhiran. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by AR Rahman and sung by Benny Dayal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
